Camera.cpp

Contains the methods used to implement the CCamera object.

Functions
CreateCamera
CAUSTICAPI CRefObj<ICamera> CreateCamera(
bool leftHanded
)

Global function for creating a camera. This method should generally not be called. Use the ICausticFactory to create new Caustic objects.

Parameters
leftHanded
bool

indicates whether we are creating a left handed coordinate system or a right handed coordinates system.

Returns

Returns the newly created camera.

CCamera
CCamera::CCamera(
bool leftHanded
) : m_leftHanded(leftHanded)

Defines the implementation of ICamera

Parameters
leftHanded
bool

indicates we should create a camera using Left handed coordinates instead of right handed coordinates.

~CCamera
CCamera::~CCamera()

Implements the dtor for CCamera
